Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class containing methods and information related to the graph. The class can be constructed based on adjacency matrix or list of edges. It can indicate whether the graph is fully, correctly and optimally colored. Author: Tomek

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int chromaticNumber
      Cache of chromatic number.
      protected Vertex[] vertices
      List of vertices.
